pageProps.content:
Experience

Legendary Lodge boasts a beautiful setting on a fragrant working coffee farm among lush tropical gardens on the outskirts of Arusha.
This tranquil retreat offers a home-away-from-home experience, sublime cuisine & exceptional service.
Ideal as a stopover point before or after a Tanzania safari or while hiking Kilimanjaro, the lodge is also a wonderful base from which to explore the nearby Arusha National Park & Ngurdoto Crater.

Stay

There are 10 elegant garden cottages, each featuring an en-suite bathroom with bathtub & rain shower as well as a private veranda overlooking the gardens with stunning views of Mount Meru.
Each cottage also boasts a cosy lounge with a fireplace.
The central lodge area includes a dining room, a covered veranda, beautiful gardens as well as a swimming pool & spa providing a range of relaxing treatments.
There is also a nearby recreation centre with gym, steam room, pool, tennis & squash courts & running track.

Activities

Legendary Lodge offers a range of exciting activities.
These include coffee tours, golf, cycling, hiking, running, swimming, shopping, garden lunches, sundowner excursions & helicopter trips.
Others include day trips to Arusha, Mount Kilimanjaro, Tarangire, Manyara National Parks or Ngorongoro Conservation Area.

subfolders.title: Arusha Coffee Lodge
subfolders.description: With a beautiful setting on the outskirts of Arusha on Tanzania’s largest coffee plantation, Arusha Coffee Lodge boasts a luxurious historic atmosphere & glorious views of towering Mount Meru. The lodge is located just 5 minutes from Arusha Airport & the ideal stopover before or after a Tanzania safari. Arusha Coffee Lodge’s guests can enjoy relaxing strolls along the rows of lush-green plantations or taste fresh coffee from their on-site coffee shop or patisserie.

subfolders.title: Hamerkop House by Lemala
subfolders.description: Hamerkop House by Lemala is a 3-bedroom villa situated on the private Kilimanjaro Golf & Wildlife Estate, halfway between Kilimanjaro International Airport & Arusha. Small & intimate, complete with experienced chefs, a private airstrip, swimming pool & spa – the villa is an ideal choice for discerning travellers looking for a luxurious escape before or after a Tanzania safari. The villa can be booked per room, or on an exclusive use basis & offers a variety of meal options, including bed & breakfast, half board, full board or all-inclusive basis.

subfolders.title: Hatari Lodge
subfolders.description: Located at the slopes of Mount Meru in Arusha National Park’s Ngurdoto Crater – also known as a ‘little Serengeti’ – Hatari Lodge boasts eclectic décor, spectacular wildlife viewing & a range of exciting safari activities. The nearby Momela Lakes are home to a variety of wildlife, including waterfowls, lazy hippos, black-&-white colobus monkeys & pink flamingos. Hatari’s private jetty runs into a popular waterhole where elephant calves & their protective mothers are often seen drinking or playing in the water.

subfolders.title: Kili Villa
subfolders.description: Kili Villa comprises 3 exclusive use, fully staffed retreats situated within a spectacular golf & wildlife estate in Arusha. Kili Villa has become the discerning traveller’s start & end to their safari adventure & can be reached by private airstrip or a 30-minute transfer from Arusha & Kilimanjaro Airports. The 3 villas offer guests a personal, private & tailor-made experience suited to their individual needs.

This tranquil retreat offers a home-away-from-home experience, sublime cuisine & exceptional service. Ideal as a stopover point before or after a Tanzania safari or while hiking Kilimanjaro, the lodge is also a wonderful base from which to explore the nearby Arusha National Park & Ngurdoto Crater.

subfolders.title: Machweo Wellness Retreat
subfolders.description: Perched on Namasi Hill in a beautiful estate’s lush gardens, Machweo Wellness Retreat is a luxury boutique hotel with an ideal location on the outskirts of Arusha – Tanzania’s gateway to the Northern safari circuit. This luxurious boutique hotel is a private sanctuary to the discerning traveller hoping to escape the hustle & bustle before or after a Tanzania safari. Not only will Machweo guests have their pick from a range of spa facilities, such as a hammam, steam room or sauna, but can also enjoy a variety of thrilling activities & sublime cuisine.

subfolders.title: Shu'Mata Camp
subfolders.description: Set on a craggy hill at the foot of Mount Kilimanjaro in the heart of the Maasai Steppe, Shu’Mata Camp is an intimate safari haven, offering awe-inspiring views of the south Amboseli savanna & Africa’s highest mountain. Shu’Mata means ‘heaven’ in the local Maa language - & aptly so – because it is so close to Kilimanjaro that on a clear night, guests might see details of its glaciers at the summit, which is the highest in all of Africa. This luxurious tented camp is situated in a private concession that is home to an abundance of wildlife like giraffe, wildebeest, eland & zebra as well as a variety of bird species.  South Amboseli is also famed for its large herds of elephants.
